value.title: StarCraft 2: AlphaStar (Artificial Intelligence) vs Grand Master League!
value.excerpt: AlphaStar has been playing on the StarCraft 2 ladder over the last few months. Recently the Google DeepMind team that has been developing this artificial intelligence released a blog post, a research paper and a replay pack about the AI.  Get more videos & support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
